infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to allow users to upload photos for timekeeping and warranty processing.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Sunhouse Service needs to access your photo gallery to select photos for warranty processing
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Sunhouse Service needs to access your photo library so you can upload for timekeeping
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Sunhouse Service requires your location so that we can check if the checkin location is valid or not
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Sunhouse Service requires your location so that we can check if the checkin location is valid or not
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Sunhouse Service requires your location so that we can check if the checkin location is valid or not
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Sunhouse Service requires your location so that we can check if the checkin location is valid or not
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
